content: > subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be notified when new patterns come out using the lemon peel stitch and bernat blanket yarn this pet mat works up quickly and is very easy to make materials needed 171 yards of a super bulky yarn 8 00 mm crochet hook finished size is 24 inches long x 14 inches wide a video tutorial for this pattern is available https //youtu be/kwfonhlc95u 1 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
